net.tmachine.gpg4
Class bModule

java.lang.Object
  net.tmachine.gpg4.bModule
All Implemented Interfaces:
iModule, java.lang.Runnable
Direct Known Subclasses:
RequestProcessor, SimpleRequestCacher
public abstract class bModule
extends java.lang.Object
implements iModule, java.lang.Runnable

Implements the state-change methods, and forces subclasses to obey the state-change invariants (i.e the rules defining how state changes may take place)

Subclasses must implement the doXXX methods (where XXX = start, stop, etc).
